text: The Karadia Koli (also spelled as Karadiya Koli) is a clan (Gotra) of Koli caste found in the Indian state of Gujarat and Union Territory of Daman and Diu and nearby areas. Karadia Kolis of Gujarat ruled over Karadi village in Jalalpore taluka of Navsari district during the time of Gujarat Sultanate and because of this, Karadia Kolis now called as Karadia. == References == Category:Koli clans
title: Karadia Koli
